name: Crisis Residential Treatment Programs/Acute Diversion Units (ADUs)
description: Avenues, San Francisco - Its purpose is to provide an alternative to hospitalization for single adults. Average length of stay for residents is two weeks. Dore Clinic & Dore House, San Francisco - The Dore Urgent Care Clinic is designed to offer clinical intervention for an individual who is experiencing an escalating psychiatric crisis and who requires rapid engagement, assessment, and intervention in order to prevent further deterioration into an acute crisis or grave disability. La Posada, Sa

howToGetIt: Your mental health clinician (such as a Psychiatrist, Therapist or Case Manager) needs to complete the referral process checklist. The Foundation does NOT accept self-referrals. For more information about services and referrals, contact the Mental Health Triage Coordinator, Maggie Krier Phone: 415-861-0828 ext 138 Email: mkrier@progressfoundation.org
